ovdesc.p: Group investment program by objective. example: Income, Balanced, Growth.

desc.p: Describes the Investment objective and is used for enrichment of the Code.
This field can be expanded to allow the User to enter the Description of the Investment objective code in various languages.
This is the code by which this investment objective can be identified.
The code represents the ID of the table.
Not used. This field can be used to classify investment objective in the rebalancing routines.
